Loved it so much!!!  We ate there twice in two days!  It was absolute heaven on a plate and a fun fresh experience that you customize to your liking.  After being carb loaded in France for weeks,  it was so nice to have fresh protein and veggie options cooked to order.  If you don't go here, you are missing a true gem.  It has great energy and lines, but it goes fast.  Don't let the lines deter you- so worth it.  Plus,  it gives you time to plan out your feast and don't worry about knowing exact weights,  they help you!  You walk up to the counter and through the excellent guidance of the staff,  you point out your selections and they help you determine quantities.  For most options,  you have the choice of fried or grilled.  Salads and bread are available too.We had a bit of every option.  My favorites were the clams and muscles in a light marinara.  Everyone in our party loved it (that's rare).  I was sad to leave Barcelona knowing I couldn't go back.  Please let there be something similar in the U.S.!!!!To be honest,  I think I could eat there everyday and never get tired of it!  :)Do yourself a favor and put this at the top of your list!
